dt-type.name: array
dt-type.description:
Javascript's native `Array` type is used to create list like objects. Arrays are created using: `[]` or `new Array()`.
A detailed description of the `Array` type is available on the [Mozilla Developer Network](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Array).
## Use in DataTables
Where a parameter is shown as accepting an array type, or a method returning an array type, it indicates that a native `Array` object is expected / returned.
